American Civil War Battle Data
================================================================================

*Version: 0.0.1*

A compilation of data on the American Civil War.
This is mostly a repackaging of data from other secondary and primary sources, although some original data are included.


.. toctree::
   :caption: Resources
   :maxdepth: 1
   :glob:
   
   resources/*
